Class Draw.Forward

  • Enclosing class:
    Draw

    public static class Draw.Forward
extends DrawCommand
    Draw a line by a specified amount and translate to the end of that line.
    See Also:
    TurtleDrawCommand#Forward

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet parent)
        Description copied from class: DrawCommand
        Does the actual drawing of the shape/line/etc. Color is handled separately, so this will simply do something like call `parent.rect(0, 0, 100, 100);`.
        Specified by:
        draw in class DrawCommand
        Parameters:
        parent - the PApplet to draw to
